description: Experience luxury living in this spacious apartment located in the prestigious area of Dhanmondi. Featuring modern amenities and breathtaking views.
facilities: Grand double height Entry
Elegant Reception and furnished waiting room
Professional Landscaping & Lighting
High speed Lifts with ARD (Automatic Rescue Device)
Infinity swimming pool with optional temperature control
Fire Safety System with fire stairs and industry grade fire pump
Power Backup by premium synchronised Generator
Multi-level car parking
Potable drinking water system with water treatment plant
Building maintenance by highly trained technicians of FMD (Facility Management Department)
Tall panoramic windows for better view & brighter interiors
CCTV Monitoring System
Building Automation System (Optional)
Fully Equipped State of the art Fitness Centre
Customised Interior fit out packages
Impressively embellished Party room with Lounge

description: Discover elegance and sophistication in this executive villa located in the upscale neighborhood of Gulshan. Perfect for families seeking luxury living.
facilities: 4 beds - Four bedrooms for comfortable accommodation
5 baths - Five bathrooms for convenience and privacy

Dining - Dedicated dining space for family meals
